issue.title: [Python] Feather reads fail with unintuitive error when conversion from pandas yields ChunkedArray
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3058](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3058). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See report in https://github.com/wesm/feather/issues/321#issuecomment-412884084

Individual string columns with more than 2GB are currently unsupported in the Feather format
